settings.question: WHAT PAYMENT METHODS DO YOU ACCEPT?
settings.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, and Apple Pay. We also offer Pay After Delivery through Klarna and installment payments through Clearpay.

settings.question: IS MY PAYMENT INFORMATION SECURE?
settings.answer: Yes, all payment information is processed securely using industry-standard encryption. We do not store your credit card information on our servers.

settings.question: CAN I USE MULTIPLE PAYMENT METHODS?
settings.answer: Currently, we only support one payment method per order. You cannot split payments between different methods.
